on reading compounds: 争奪【ソウダツ】struggle (for), scramble, contest
係争【ケイソウ】contention, dispute, conflict, controversy
kun reading compounds: 争う【あらそう】to compete, to contest, to contend, to quarrel, to argue, to dispute, to be at variance, to oppose, to deny (e.g. evidence)
争うべからざる【あらそうべからざる】indisputable
